com.airs.handlers
Class WifiHandler

java.lang.Object
  PhoneStateListener
      com.airs.handlers.WifiHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Handler, Runnable
public class WifiHandler
extends PhoneStateListener
implements Handler, Runnable

Class to read WiFi related sensors, specifically the WF, WI, WM, WS, WC sensor

See Also:
Handler

Constructor Summary
WifiHandler(Context nors)
          Constructor, allocating all necessary resources for the handler Here, it's reading the preference settings for the polltime and enabling WiFi Then, it's getting a reference to the WifiManager and finally, it's arming the semaphores
 
Method Summary
 byte[] Acquire(String sensor, String query)
          Method to acquire sensor data Initialise WiFi scanning thread, if not done before Also initialise the WC sensor thread
 void destroyHandler()
          Method to release all handler resources Here, we release all semaphores, then shut down any acquisition threads and release the wifi lock, if held
 void Discover()
          Method to discover the sensor symbols support by this handler As the result of the discovery, appropriate Sensor entries will be added to the SensorRepository, if WiFi available
 void History(String sensor)
          Method to view historical chart of the given sensor symbol - here doing nothing
 void run()
          run WiFi discovery in separate thread
 String Share(String sensor)
          Method to share the last value of the given sensor - here doing nothing

Constructor Detail

WifiHandler

public WifiHandler(Context nors)
Constructor, allocating all necessary resources for the handler Here, it's reading the preference settings for the polltime and enabling WiFi Then, it's getting a reference to the WifiManager and finally, it's arming the semaphores

Parameters:
nors - Reference to the calling Context
Method Detail

Acquire

public byte[] Acquire(String sensor,
                      String query)
Method to acquire sensor data Initialise WiFi scanning thread, if not done before Also initialise the WC sensor thread

Specified by:
Acquire in interface Handler
Parameters:
sensor - String of the sensor symbol
query - String of the query to be fulfilled - not used here
See Also:
Handler.Acquire(java.lang.String, java.lang.String)

Share

public String Share(String sensor)
Method to share the last value of the given sensor - here doing nothing

Specified by:

Parameters:
sensor - String of the sensor symbol to be shared
Returns:
human-readable string of the last sensor value

History

public void History(String sensor)
Method to view historical chart of the given sensor symbol - here doing nothing

Specified by:
History in interface Handler
Parameters:
sensor - String of the symbol for which the history is being requested
See Also:
Handler.History(java.lang.String)

Discover

public void Discover()
Method to discover the sensor symbols support by this handler As the result of the discovery, appropriate Sensor entries will be added to the SensorRepository, if WiFi available

Specified by:
Discover in interface Handler
See Also:
Handler.Discover(), Sensor, SensorRepository

destroyHandler

public void destroyHandler()
Method to release all handler resources Here, we release all semaphores, then shut down any acquisition threads and release the wifi lock, if held

Specified by:
destroyHandler in interface Handler
See Also:
Handler.destroyHandler()

run

public void run()
run WiFi discovery in separate thread
